Key Match Events: Ismael Kone and Alphonso Davies missed their penalties
Pre-Game Insights: Canada's best tournament performance in some time
Canada looks rejuvenated under Jesse Marsch
Uruguay coach Marcelo Bielsa thought their performance should have been better
Post-Match Reflections: Jesse Marsch praised the potential of his team
Marcelo Bielsa was grateful for the victory despite the semi-final loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: Suarez scored a last-gasp goal in the 92nd minute
Canada had a 2-1 lead before Uruguay equalized
